org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 AbstractStormCollector<OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.AbstractStormCollector<OUT>
  • 直接已知子类:
    BoltCollector, SpoutCollector

    abstract class AbstractStormCollector<OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
    A AbstractStormCollector transforms Storm tuples to Flink tuples.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> numberOfAttributes
      The number of attributes of the output tuples per stream.
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Tuple> outputTuple
      Flink output tuple of concrete type Tuple0 to Tuple25 per output stream.
      private boolean split
      Indicates of multiple output stream are declared and thus SplitStreamType must be used as output.
      private SplitStreamType<java.lang.Object> splitTuple
      Flink split tuple.
      private int taskId
      The ID of the producer task.
      (专用程序包) boolean tupleEmitted
      Is set to true each time a tuple is emitted.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AbstractStormCollector(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> numberOfAttributes, int taskId)
      Instantiates a new AbstractStormCollector that emits Flink tuples via doEmit(Object).

      Emits a Flink tuple.

    • 字段详细资料

      • outputTuple

        protected final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Tuple> outputTuple
        Flink output tuple of concrete type Tuple0 to Tuple25 per output stream.

      • splitTuple

        private final SplitStreamType<java.lang.Object> splitTuple
        Flink split tuple. Used, if multiple output streams are declared.

      • numberOfAttributes

        protected final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> numberOfAttributes
        The number of attributes of the output tuples per stream. (Determines the concrete type of outputTuple). If numberOfAttributes is zero, outputTuple is not used and "raw" data type is used.

      • split

        private final boolean split
        Indicates of multiple output stream are declared and thus SplitStreamType must be used as output.

      • taskId

        private final int taskId
        The ID of the producer task.

      • tupleEmitted

        boolean tupleEmitted
        Is set to true each time a tuple is emitted.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractStormCollector

        AbstractStormCollector(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> numberOfAttributes,
                       int taskId)
                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Instantiates a new AbstractStormCollector that emits Flink tuples via doEmit(Object). If the number of attributes is negative, any output type is supported (ie, raw type). If the number of attributes is between 0 and 25, the output type is Tuple0 to Tuple25, respectively.
        参数:
        numberOfAttributes - The number of attributes of the emitted tuples per output stream.
        taskId - The ID of the producer task (negative value for unknown).
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the specified number of attributes is greater than 25 or taskId support is enabled for a raw stream

    • 方法详细资料

      • tansformAndEmit

        protected final java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> tansformAndEmit(java.lang.String streamId,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Object> tuple)
        Transforms a Storm tuple into a Flink tuple of type OUT and emits this tuple via doEmit(Object) to the specified output stream.
        参数:
        The - The output stream id.
        tuple - The Storm tuple to be emitted.
        返回:
        the return value of doEmit(Object)

      • doEmit

        protected abstract java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> doEmit(OUT flinkTuple)
        Emits a Flink tuple.
        参数:
        flinkTuple - The tuple to be emitted.
        返回:
        the IDs of the tasks this tuple was sent to
